recipes.label: Study Latin with a Tutor
recipes.startdescription: If I need to learn Latin, here's one who will help; but I'll need to pay in spintriae, the currency of the hidden world.
recipes.description: Tutors don't work for free. Another time.

recipes.label: Study Latin with a Tutor
recipes.startdescription: This will be sufficient. I'll listen carefully.
recipes.description: The language of Lucretius' 'On the Nature of Things', of Aquinas' 'Summa Theologiae', and of the notorious 'De Horis...'

recipes.label: Study Fucine with a Tutor
recipes.startdescription: 'Fucine? Yes, I get by in Fucine. I can teach you, if you have Latin as a grounding. But if I hear one crack about the 'tongue of witches', it's off.'
recipes.description: I don't have the grounding I needed.

recipes.label: Study Fucine with a Tutor
recipes.startdescription: My Latin will serve as a foundation. I'll learn everything I can.
recipes.description: One cannot speak Fucine for long without sipping water. It parches the lips; it dries the throat. It could only have been spoken by a people who lived close to a lake-shore.

recipes.label: Study Phrygian with a Tutor
recipes.startdescription: 'Phrygian! The Great Mother's tongue! Of course. If you have enough Greek, I guarantee that the experience of learning Phrygian will be very pleasant.'
recipes.description: I don't have the grounding I needed.

recipes.label: Study Phrygian with a Tutor
recipes.startdescription: My Greek will serve as a foundation. I'll learn everything I can.
recipes.description: Herodotus tells a wild story of a pharaoh who discovered the Phrygian language was the first spoken by humans. He was wrong, of course; it was Vak. But everyone enjoys the story.

recipes.label: Study Deep Mandaic with a Tutor
recipes.startdescription: 'TOGETHER WE WILL COMMEMORATE THE TONGUE OF THE UNBURNT GOD.'
recipes.description: I don't have the grounding I needed.

recipes.label: Study Deep Mandaic with a Tutor
recipes.startdescription: My Aramaic will serve as a foundation. I'll learn everything I can.
recipes.description: In one History, this was the tongue the Shadowless Kings spoke. In another, it was the basis of the incantations of the children of the Leashed Flame.
